ingredients.ingredient: 1 bunch kale - stems removed and discarded, leaves torn into even pieces
2 tablespoons real maple syrup, or to taste

cookingTips: Tear kale into uniform pieces for even baking and consistent texture
Pat kale completely dry to prevent steaming; moisture prevents crispiness
Low temperature (275-300Â°F) for 15-20 minutes prevents burning while achieving crunch
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Show me how to achieve crispy kale chips with maple sweetness that aren't burnt or chewy.
